meanings.sent1: Her cheekiness in class got her in trouble with the teacher.
meanings.sent2: The child's cheekiness towards adults was not appreciated.
meanings.sent3: Despite his cheekiness, he always managed to charm his way out of trouble.
meanings.sent4: The politician's cheekiness in the debate raised eyebrows among the audience.
meanings.sent5: The cheekiness of the student's response left everyone speechless.

meanings.sent1: She had a cheekiness that made her friends laugh.
meanings.sent2: His cheekiness was endearing to those who knew him well.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's cheekiness as it stole a sock made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The cat's cheekiness in knocking over the vase was both frustrating and amusing.
meanings.sent5: The cheekiness of the squirrel stealing nuts from the bird feeder was a daily occurrence.
